attributes.action: Stop babies being taken from young struggling mothers. Give support
attributes.background: The local authority are too quick at removing children from young mothers that are struggling. Instead they should give more support. My two young children were recently removed from my care because I was struggling. Yes I made mistakes but that doesn't mean I'm a bad parent. This needs to stop.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to require local councils to provide more support for struggling parents.
